name: Intellisense

overview:
Intellisense is one of the leading software and IT services companies in Uganda. Intellisense delivers products and services that help accelerate business innovation for our customers. We believe that doing so will unleash growth and create significant new value â€“ for our customers.

The services we offer include software development, website design and development, IT training for both students and business professionals, and IT support services like office IT infrastructure installations e.g. Internet, email and messaging, Office Telephone Intercom systems, shared printing services and more.
